Package org.codehaus.preon.el.util

Some utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Converter<T,V> The interface defining an object capable of converting instances of T to V.
 

Class Summary
ClassUtils A couple of utilities supporting classes.
Converters  
ExpressionBuilder<E> A simple convenience class for building Expression instances, simply encapsulating a ReferenceContext, allowing clients to be unaware of the particular ReferenceContext in use.
NullDocument A null implementation of Document.
StringBuilderDocument
